flavorText:
"Whereas I was created to protect, the biskelion was created to destroy."
—Karn, silver golem

foreignData.name: Gezacktes Biskelion
foreignData.text: {T}: Lege eine -1/-1 Marke auf das Gezackte Biskelion und eine -1/-1 Marke auf eine Kreatur Deiner Wahl.

foreignData.name: ギザギザ・バイスケリオン

name: Serrated Biskelion
originalText:
oc
T: Put a -1/-1 counter on Serrated Biskelion and a -1/-1 counter on target creature.

rulings.text: If Serrated Biskelion leaves the battlefield before its ability resolves, you’ll still put a -1/-1 counter on the targeted creature. If the target leaves the battlefield or otherwise becomes an illegal target before the ability resolves, the ability doesn’t resolve and you won’t put a -1/-1 counter on Serrated Biskelion.

text: {T}: Put a -1/-1 counter on Serrated Biskelion and a -1/-1 counter on target creature.
